Some engineers seem to be drawn by the work at a smaller company, which offers an opportunity to reshape culture with less corporate bureaucracy and more creative freedom. Facebook has become the cool kid on the block, and now Google wants to prove it can still be cool, too, says Danny Sullivan , who follows both companies closely as editor-in-chief of Search Engine Land. gate to halt looting. Zahi Hawass said the Egyptian Museum's collection is now secure from thieves. The greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched firetrucks spray water on the smoldering NDP headquarters. The museum, home to the gold mask of King Tutankhamun that draws millions of tourists a year, also houses thousands of artifacts
